## Lecture

This week we extend last week's introduction to CFA by focussing on model estimation and identification.

### Recordings


These five recordings supplement Caspar's overview from last week. These recordings dig deeper into some of the more
tricky ideas that tend to cause the most confusion. In particular, these recordings focus on model estimation,
identification, and scaling.
